references: Repealing: Ord 92987, Ord 99992, Ord 104034, Ord 105464, Ord 107837, Ord 108421
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Public Health Department; adding to the Seattle Municipal Code a new chapter that regulates the storage, sale and serving of foods in, and the construction, maintenance, and operation of, food-service establishments; requires permits; establishes fees; defines offenses; and prescribes penalties; and repealing Seattle Municipal code Chapter 10.10 and Ordinance 92987, 99992, 104034, 105464, 107837 and 108421.
